description.p: Etched with eldritch runes, this 1—inch-diameter ruby can be attached to a weapon and used to channel magical energy, allowing the user to manoeuvre the weapon to perform somatic components of spells. If the user does not have the weapon equipped or cannot correctly manoeuvre the weapon for any reason, somatic components must be cast as normal. The ruby also gives proficiency to constitution saving throws. For this property to work, you must attach the ruby to the weapon by pressing the ruby against it for at least 10 minutes. Thereafter, the ruby can’t be removed unless you detach it as an action or the weapon is destroyed. Not even an antimagic field causes it to fall off. The ruby does fall off the weapon if your attunement to the ruby ends.

Fey, ornate design clearly made to honour a special occasion, the bearer can understand and speak sylvan while attuned to it, item is sentient [BLANK] bracelet, sets charisma to 19, advantage on charisma checks.
This bowstring is permanently covered in a thin frost that is cold to the touch. When activated, the thin frost covers the arrowhead, and crystalizes into a sharp coating of ice.

ul.li: The bowstring must be strung to the bow in use to be activated (this takes one hour).
This string must be activated before firing. This can be done as a free action.
It holds 2 charges and regains both after a long rest.
The next arrow fired after activation gains 1d10 cold damage, and the charge is expended even upon a miss.

description.p: This armour was forged from pieces of monsters slayen by Krete. A Cloak of Protection lined with a Bone Devil's tail and adorned with a dragon skull pauldran and T-Rex teeth. Enchanted together by Hamish Hardshell with the help of Icora.
-Reforged Devil's Poison. As an action, you can stab a creature of your choice and grant them 5d6 Temporary HP.
